description:
Plot 14A
Without planning permission: the unauthorised material change of use of the land from use as agricultural land to a mixed/composite planning unit used for three distinct uses including (i) agriculture including the ordinary incidental/ancillary storage of plant and equipment and containers: (ii) a sui generis haulage use including, the parking, servicing, repair and refuelling of HGVs, trailers and tankers along with the ordinarily incidental /ancillary purposes associated with this use including stationing of fuel/chemicals tanks and storage of plant and equipment associated with the maintenance of HGVs,  trailers and tankers, and(iii) a sui generis use involving the buying and selling of containers and portable buildings
street_name: to north west of 9-15 Juliette Way
